column4: I'm suffering problems of screen resolution. I had reconfigured xorg.conf using dpkg-reconfigure xserver-org, but I get a low screen resolution 640x480 on the next login. Any idea?
ronaldo, Intel Corporation Mobile 945GM/GMS, 943/940GML Express Integrated Graphics Controlle
